title: SCF Common Definitions
description: Shared definitions for SCF schemas including common entity properties and reserved terms

menu_order.description: The order of this entity in the admin menu

advanced_configuration.description: [SCF] Whether advanced configuration options are enabled. Accepts boolean or integer (0/1).

modified.description: [SCF Export Only] Unix timestamp of last modification

import_source.description: [SCF Export Only] Source of import if this entity was imported

import_date.description: [SCF Export Only] Date when this entity was imported

wordpressReservedTerms.description: WordPress reserved terms that cannot be used as post type or taxonomy slugs. Using these terms will cause conflicts with WordPress core functionality.
